name: Transatel
tag_list: m2m-connectivity-provider, managed-services-for-operators, mvno-enabler, multi-imsi-expertise, full-mvno, ussd, embedded-sim
overview:
Transatel is a European telecom company founded in August 2000 with operations in France, Switzerland, UK and in the Benelux countries and various projects in Europe and Middle East. Transatel has three main activities:

  • MVNO-Enabler (MVNE), consisting of offering turnkey solutions to companies wishing to become MVNO (voice or M2M). As an MVNE, Transatel is already connected to 8 major mobile operators in Europe and has international offers in M2M.
  • M2M plateform management for MNO : Transatel has, for example, been selected as the M2M provider of Everything Everywhere in the UK.
  • Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO) : mobile phone services dedicated to frequent international travellers and cross-border populations under its own brands. Its offers enable significant cost savings for its subscribers with a multi-IMSI technology patented by Transatel.

For more information, please visit www.transatel-m2m.com www.transatel.com, www.transatel-solutions.com
